content: Jubilee has marked this topic as resolved.
Ah it might be an extension of this? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/58279
The first one seems largely unrelated. This is a general issue with the fact that attributes don't propagate.
Except maybe in very very specific cases where somebody went through the effort to implement some sort of hack for a specific attribute.
And the 2nd seems like it's the one yes. Now its pretty apparent to me why it doesn't work too â€“ cfgs are handled in early macro expansion after all.
